name: Permits
text:
A permit shall be required for the purchase of:



	(1)	Any non-aerial common fireworks commonly known as firecrackers upon payment of a fee of $25; and
	(2)	Any aerial common fireworks and any special fireworks for the purposes of section 132D-16. [L 1994, c 180, pt of §1; am L 2000, c 233, §10]
